Sure! Here are two recipes incorporating mushrooms in smoothies:

1. Berry & Reishi Smoothie:

Ingredients:
- 1/2 cup mixed berries (fresh or frozen)
- 1/2 frozen banana
- 1/4 cup plain yogurt
- 1 tsp reishi mushroom powder
- 1/2 cup almond milk
- 1 tsp honey

Directions:
1. Place all ingredients in a blender.
2. Blend until smooth.
3. Adjust sweetness as necessary.
4. Serve cold and enjoy!

2. Chocolate & Chaga Smoothie:

Ingredients:
- 1/2 cup almond milk
- 1/2 frozen banana
- 1/4 avocado
- 1 scoop chocolate protein powder
- 1 tsp chaga mushroom powder
- 1 tsp honey

Directions:
1. Place all ingredients in a blender.
2. Blend until smooth.
3. Adjust sweetness as necessary.
4. Serve cold and enjoy!

These smoothies are packed with nutrients and delicious flavors. Also, feel free to experiment and adjust the ingredients to your liking!
